name: Twin Pines Ranch (North)
description: The northern expanse of the Twin Pines Ranch, a verdant sea of green under the bright blue sky, meticulously tended by the Peabody family. Rows of corn stretch as far as the eye can see, their stalks rustling a gentle, contented symphony in the breeze. A few crows circle overhead, their calls a harmonious counterpoint to the wholesome hum of the countryside. The air smells of rich, fertile earth and the faint, sweet aroma of growing things, a promise of bountiful harvests.
